p.k: When Rob purchases a universal remote from the Awesome Store, he discovers he can control the universe. He rewinds into the past and remembers Gumball had left him in The Void. / Gumball saved himself from being trapped in The Void, just in time. The remote has now taken Gumball back to the beginning of that disastrous day. / Fed up with having to listen to Molly's long, tedious anecdotes, Gumball and Darwin try to teach her how to make them sound more exciting. / Gumball and Darwin put Anais' new friend, Josh, through a series of tests, to see if he's good enough for their sister. / Gumball and Darwin are convinced it's a day when nothing interesting is happening. But as they walk around Elmore, it is apparent exciting things are happening just not to them.
